name: Assassin's Creed: The Rebel Collection
overview: Assassin’s Creed: The Rebel Collection is a compilation of Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag and Assassin's Creed: Rogue - Remastered. Next to both base games it comes with all DLC items, which were previously commercial add-ons for the other platforms. Additionally Switch enhanced features include: handheld Mode, HD rumble, touch screen interface, and motion control aiming.
